scenario_text.value: Miu! You’re not hurt, are you?!
No, I’m all right. Boy, that was scary!

I’m so sorry. I got so caught up in the fight
that we got separated.
I failed you as a brother...
That’s why...back then, I couldn’t...
Seriously! You never really see me!

You always push me behind you, and show your
back to me. You never turn my way!
Urk...
Miu depends on you, you know. So ya see...

You gotta actually hear her out, not just
keep her outta harm’s way, okay, big bro?
Yeah, big bro!
I had no idea...

I’m sorry, Miu. I guess I never had it in me
to really think about what you wanted, and—

Yes, great, now ain’t this a pretty picture.
But look around, it’s about to get ugly here!
The fog... It’s creeping closer!
Yeah, so time to go!

The others have already evacuated. We’re the
only ones left. We should try and catch up.
Everyone? So all the others are safe? Really?
Saki and Aoi did everything they could.

We’ll have to thank them, too...
Right, Miu?
Yeah!
Okay, let’s go!
Huh?

Oh! I just heard a voice!
Someone’s still here!

I didn’t hear anything.
Sure you didn’t imagine it?
No, I heard it, I swear! Over there...

Miu! Hey, come back! You know you can’t just
run off on your own!

But you guys can’t hear it, can you? That
means I gotta lead the way!

We don’t have time for a side trip! You know
what it means when the fog gets thicker!

Of course I know! That doesn’t mean I can
just abandon them!

I was the queen here for a little while, you
know! These guys are like family to me!

I won’t abandon them, not ever! I’d never let
them experience such sadness...
Wait, Miu! I’ll go with you!
Hey, hold on! I said it’s—

Wait... Hold up, is this what she’s talking
about when she goes off on me?
I mean, it’s not like you’re wrong, Kaito.

Yeah, it’s way too dangerous to go alone at
a time like this!

Yeah... Yeah, you’re right. C’mon, man, we
gotta go after her!
Yeah!
HELP...ME...
Don’t worry, your queen is here to save you!
Hey Miu! You find them already?!
Yeah, over here, Kaito!
YEAH... YOU FOUND ME, ALL RIGHT.
Huh?

(The creature in front of Miu...turned into
fog?!)
FUUUSSSHAAAAAAAAAAAA!
Is that...an enemy?! Is this a trick?!

(Oh no! Kaito, Syakomon... Neither of them
can reach her in time!)
Kaito—
MIUUUUUUUUU!
The fog swallowed her up...!
Wait, Miu! I’m... I’m...!
My...my legs...
Kaito, what’s wrong?

Wha’...what am I hesitating for?! I’ve gotta
go save her...!

No, Kaito!
You’ll get sucked into the fog, too!

Shaddup! Let me go! I... Miu... I’ll be too
late!
UWAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!
Syakomon!

(Syakomon’s body is disappearing?! Just like
what happened back with Ryo!)

Yeah... That’s how it goes.
Sorry, Miu, everyone...
I couldn’t...protect her. My...precious...
Syakomon!!! No... It can’t be...

Hey! HEY!!! What happened to Miu?! Answer
me!!!
Urk...

(The only reason I survived being swallowed
up by the fog was because Miyuki was there.)

(Miu was swallowed up, and Syakomon
vanished... That can only mean...)
...Shit!
No! Don’t go, Kaito!!!
...Let go of me!
She’s... She’s gone...

Don’t you get it, man?!
Miu’s gone!!!

You don’t know that! I can’t... I can’t
believe that...!

She could still be alive, just like that time
with you!
Let GO of me, goddammit! LET GOOOOOO!

Dracmon, Agumon. We need to get Kaito out of
here.
B-but... Takuma...

At this rate, everyone will get sucked up by
the fog. I won’t let that happen.
Yeah... I can’t let Kaito die, too.

Let’s go, Kaito. I’ll get you out of here
if I have to drag you myself!
